articles.author: Dr. William Li
articles.title: This new ‘MediterAsian’ diet is the No. 1 way to ‘boost your immune system,' says longevity doctor - CNBC
articles.description: Dr. William Li, a physician, food scientist and bestselling author, has spent 20 years studying how our diets can help us fight diseases and live longer. He shares his No. 1 longevity diet that keeps his body young, strong and healthy.
articles.content:
As a doctor and food scientist, I've spent 20 years studying how our diets can help us beat diseases and live longer.
I've always taken a natural food-based approach, and much of my diet is inspired… [+4915 chars]

articles.author: Amit Bhardwaj
articles.title: Wrestlers will participate in Asian Games only when issues are resolved: Sakshi Malik - India Today
articles.description: One of the protesting wrestlers, Sakshi Malik, said they would not participate in the Asian Games until their issues were not resolved. The wrestlers have been demanding a probe into the sexual harassment case against WFI chief Brij Bhushan and his arrest in …
